channel.title: Cigars
channel.description:
No, this isn't a debate. They are fucking cool, end of story.
Discuss how cool they are.
ITT: what brand you smoke, etc. [size=5pt]cigars/cigarillos[/size]
[img]http://www.cwdlp.com/images/PipeTobacco/CBPipeTobaccoPP.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.cigar5packs.com/images/cigars/brand/primetime_200.jpg[/img] Favourite brands. Me and my friends call the cherry flavoured ones cherry yum-yum's because they're yummy and cherry.
FTW

item.title: Cigars
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Man i love cigars… never smoked them as I reckon you can only smoke them if you’re a true gangsta. They smell sooooooo good though. Whenever I go to Dominican Republic I can smell them and it’s like “mutha fucka that smells nice!”

Read full topic

item.title: Cigars
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Not X A Alex, post:13, topic:202600”][quote author=Modest Mouse link=topic=267270.msg2216416#msg2216416 date=1210214156]
What sets cigars away from cigarettes?
[/quote]
You do not inhale cigars, there wrapping paper is made of tobacco, they are worse for you besides the part were you don’t chain smoke then usually.
I don’t smoke cigars usually there the shit though after weed I love them but I smoke cigarettes more
My favorite is captain black-vanilla[/quote]
But, if you do inhale them… You get the biggest headrush OF LIFE! Lol.

Anyway, my friends have been bragging about Romeo & Juliets and I’ve started to get jealous :(, so I’m thinking of pickin’ some up. I had Whiskey flavoured Colts last night and they tasted like ass

Read full topic

@Yz85Racer wrote:

They ruin your health.

kthx

item.title: Cigars
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

Modest Mouse:

What sets cigars away from cigarettes?

You do not inhale cigars, there wrapping paper is made of tobacco, they are worse for you besides the part were you don’t chain smoke then usually.
I don’t smoke cigars usually there the shit though after weed I love them but I smoke cigarettes more
My favorite is captain black-vanilla

Read full topic

item.title: Cigars
item.dc:creator: @Modest_Mouse Modest Mouse
item.description:
@Modest_Mouse wrote:

What sets cigars away from cigarettes?
Because I smoke cigs and I don’t see how you would smoke it differently?

Read full topic

item.title: Cigars
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:5, topic:202600”]I’ve actually never had an actual cigarette, lol. But yeah the licking your lips thing is the good part about Prime Times, few days ago I took the filter off of one n got a mad headrush from it lol I was surprised.
I might wanna try those Montecristo’s or something though.[/quote]
Nor have I, but when you look at what’s put into it you will see that it is basically a cigarette.
You’ve got to get a hold of a Montecristo, one of the best cigars you’ll ever have. So smooth, so yummy.

Read full topic

item.title: Cigars
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:6, topic:202600”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=267270.msg2208180#msg2208180 date=1209760260]

jme I think I’ve had a cuban before but ugh… Whilst smoking it between 2 other friends it got nigger-lipped by one of them (when they wet it all up n shit with their saliva…) so it wasn’t that good of an experience lol.

Heh, I laugh at how we always call it monkey lipping. Kinda similar to nigger lipping in a racist way since essentially niggers == monkeys lol.
[/quote][/quote]
Lol, failed quote

Yeah… I’m sitting there smelling it the whole time before I smoke it all like but thenz when I like smokez it I’m all like

edit: my fav. is wildberry

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

Same with me, it smells awsome.

I feel bad when i smoke them, then i miss out on the smell :).

item.title: Cigars
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Carson, post:7, topic:202600”]My friends and I steal Prime Times, the grape flavor from the local quicky mart.

There great.[/quote]

Grape is my favorite.

I almost hate smoking it, I could sit there all day just smelling it.

item.title: Cigars
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:2, topic:202600”]I personally hate Prime Times because it’s basically a flavoured cigarette. They don’t taste all that great unless you lick your lips afterwards and if you were to smoke them like a cigarette it does nothing. Useless either way.[/quote] I’ve actually never had an actual cigarette, lol. But yeah the licking your lips thing is the good part about Prime Times, few days ago I took the filter off of one n got a mad headrush from it lol I was surprised.
I might wanna try those Montecristo’s or something though.

jme I think I’ve had a cuban before but ugh… Whilst smoking it between 2 other friends it got nigger-lipped by one of them (when they wet it all up n shit with their saliva…) so it wasn’t that good of an experience lol.

Mopman, BRAND NOW. ;o

Read full topic

item.title: Cigars
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Very rarely smoke cigars, a truck driver we know brings back these belgian? things that are the tastiest smoke I’ve ever tasted, I should find out the actual brand name.

Daily cig smoking makes cigars a pain in the arse to smoke though, natural reflexes are bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Cigars
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

They are pretty badass to smoke. Usually all I can get are prime times and colts.

My dad brought back a huge box of cigars from a cigar factory in cuba. Of course I skeetched a few from him, those were some fucking awesome cigars.

Read full topic

item.title: Cigars
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Romeo y Julieta and Montecristo are my favourites. The Cubans know what they’re doing. They’re expensive as hell here, but in Cuba I bought them for $2 USD for 10. If I sold them here I would make somewhere around $43-$58 profit due to them being Romeo y Julieta Churchill Tubos. Pretty damn affordable I’d say.
I kept them of course, I still have a few packs left (family brought a shit load back).

I personally hate Prime Times because it’s basically a flavoured cigarette. They don’t taste all that great unless you lick your lips afterwards and if you were to smoke them like a cigarette it does nothing. Useless either way.

Uriko:

They are fucking cool, end of story.

Damn straight.

Read full topic
